question:
Consider the following organisations:
  1. COMESA
  2. ASEAN Plus Three
  3. Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation (APEC)
At present, India is a member of which of the above?
explanation:
India is not a member of any of the given options.
  • APEC currently has 21 members, including most countries with a coastline on the Pacific Ocean.
  • ASEAN is a political and economic organization of ten Southeast Asian countries
  • ASEAN Plus Three countries include ASEAN countries + China, Japan, and South Korea.
  • The Common Market for Eastern and Southern Africa (COMESA) is a free trade area with twenty African member states stretching from Libya to Swaziland.
